Product.title: Product
Product.description: Represents a product in the auto accessories shop.

stock.description: Current quantity of the product in stock.

purchasePrice.description: The price at which the product was purchased.

sellingPrice.description: The price at which the product is sold.

compatibility.description: Information about which vehicles the product is compatible with.

lastPurchaseDate.description: The date of the last purchase for this product.

Transaction.title: Transaction
Transaction.description: Represents a single transaction, which can be a sale or a return.

productId.description: The ID of the product involved in the transaction.

productName.description: The name of the product, denormalized for easier display.

dateTime.description: Timestamp of when the transaction occurred.

quantity.description: Quantity of the product in the transaction.

amount.description: Total amount for the transaction. Can be negative for returns.

/products/{productId}.description: Stores all product information for the auto accessories shop.

/transactions/{transactionId}.description: Stores all sale, purchase, and return transactions.
